item.title: Nanci add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Nanci add a quote by A.A. Milne
Nanci add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Nanci add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description:
"People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.
A true soul mate is probably the most important person you'll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.
A soul mates purpose is to shake you up, tear apart your ego a little bit, show you your obstacles and addictions, break your heart open so new light can get in, make you so desperate and out of control that you have to transform your life, then introduce you to your spiritual master..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four people is suffering from a mental illness. Look at your 3 best friends. If they're ok, then it's you." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The Very first moment I beheld him, my heart was irrevocably gone." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Ah! There is nothing like staying at home, for real comfort." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "That it will never come again is what makes life so sweet." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Emily Dickinson
Nanci add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Bring me the sunset in a cup." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "The dearest ones of time, the strongest friends of the soul--BOOKS." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "The lovely flowers embarrass me. They make me regret I am not a bee..." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "I'll tell you how the sun rose, a ribbon at a time. The steeples swam in amethyst, The news like squirrels ran. The hills untied their bonnets, The bobolinks begun. Then I said softly to myself, "That must have been the sun!" -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "I must go in, the fog is rising." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Find ecstasy in life; the mere sense of living is joy enough." -- Emily Dickinson
